casebody.data:
Second Department,

May, 1944.

(May 1, 1944.) Walker J. Burns, Individually and as Administrator of the Estate of Mildred T. Burns, Deceased, Appellant, v. John G. Turnbull et al., Respondents, et al., Defendants.

Motion for reargument granted and case set down for argument on Wednesday, May 24, 1944. [See 266 App. Div. 779.] Present— Close, P. J., Hagarty, Adel, Lewis and Aldrich, JJ.
